name: Hashbon Pass
introduce: Hashbon Pass is an NFT protocol for reusable identity verification on blockchains such as Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon and other EVM-compatible networks. It is a innovative solution to the KYC problem in DeFi for both individuals and services (B2C & B2B). Hashbon Pass’ key feature is anonymous KYC. This means that DeFi-protocols do not actually have access to the user s personal data, but they can filter out individuals from sanction lists, as well as calculate the user’s credit scoring and social rating.
